===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# fruit of the [[fennel]] or Foeniculum (an [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] externally to treat abdominal pain; internally to "warm the interior", treat colic pain, cholera, swollen testes, and to promote lactation)
